overview: A woman leads a desperate life. The reason for this is her unbreakable feelings for a man she has broken up with, and when her boyfriend feels that his love for her is out of control, he gets down on his knees to see her old lover and ask him to get back together with her. Thanks to this, the woman starts seeing her former lover again, but she cannot break up with one of the men either. Then one day, she discovers that her former lover is a Shabba. The strange love triangle goes deeper and deeper.
tagline: Getting mixed up and rolling over.
title: Naked Soul
